video_description: acer iconia tab a200 http://www.netbooknews.com  The video does not go into technical details, but judging from the footage we can know for certain 10-inch screen, the presence of a full-size USB port, an SD card reader and Google Android. He was talking Tegra 2, a resolution of 1280 × 800 pixels and 1GB of RAM for this tablet, described as a review of the current economic Iconia Tab A500 , however, slightly revised from the point of view of aesthetics (lighter and thin).
title: Acer Iconia Tab A200 Tablet Overview
